Miro,

Sorry for the late response.  You should be able to right-click the
test result in the JUnit view, and select "Rerun JUnit test".  I
believe you can also right-click a method in the Outline view and
select "Run As... > JUnit Test".  Let me know if this doesn't work for
you.

On Sat, Aug 30, 2008 at 12:52 PM, miro <miroconnect@...> wrote:
>
> I have a Junit test class which has 20 test methods.If I want to test a
> single test method is there a way .I run junit tests from eclipse , so is
> there any way in eclipse i can ask junit runner to run just one test method
> or few test methods and not all ?
> --
